directions: Bring hibiscus, brown sugar, rosemary, cloves, allspice berries, 2 cinnamon sticks, 3 star anise pods, and 12 cups water to a boil in a large pot. Cook until reduced by half, 50-60 minutes. Strain through a fine-mesh sieve into a large bowl; discard solids. Chill hibiscus mixture until cold, at least 4 hours.
Stir tequila into chilled hibiscus mixture and serve in rocks glasses filled with crushed ice. Garnish each cocktail with a cinnamon stick, a star anise pod, and a lemon slice.
Do Ahead: Hibiscus mixture can be made 4 days ahead. Cover and keep chilled.
ingredients: 2 cinnamon sticks, plus more for serving
3 star anise pods, plus more for serving
title: Especiado Cocktail
